data.message: Hello! My livli hood depends on my IG account, and I cannot get anyone to help me which is utterly strange. I feel I have been hacked, and now my account has been disabled. An error message pops up and says I have violated the terms. I have filled out the form under 'Learn More'. I need help right away in this matter. My handle is @ecobeautymentor. Please let me know what you can do to help restore my account. Thank you so much!

replies.message: Hey Dianna. We regret to hear that you're having issues with your Instagram account. For help troubleshooting Instagram issues, please head to our Instagram Help Center: http://bit.ly/2uYR4lY. -Ashley
